ygData.subject: Re: Monday(thanks)

My apologies about my post on Sunday, I was tired and forgot 
about the day of silence, actually I also forgot it was Sunday (to 
much hockey...)

On 5 Feb 2001, at 8:14, kinger01030@... wrote:

>  Its Monday and I'd like to thank all the people who participated in the day 
> of silence yesterday. It was very sucessful and I thank you for honoring his 
> memory. Now its Monday I got a snow day so im ready to work.
>
